Name: Hematite alpha Fe_2O_3
Type: Mineral
Class: Oxides
Subclass: 
Particle Size: 0-45um
Sample No.: O-1B
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: 
Collected by Baker, J.T.
Description:  Synthetic hematite. 
Some water contamination.




Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: o01ba.txt
